popUp_text_description:
Are you sure you wanna skip the
timer? We recommend following the
instructions of the test and wait 15
minutes in order to see the results.
Upload_question_test_0: Do you see a top line on the test strip next to C?
Upload_question_test_01: Do you see a lower line on the test strip next to T?
Upload_question_test_02: What results did you get in the test?

self_t_question_test_drop_down_03: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine?
self_t_question_test_drop_down_04: In the last 14 days, have you been in contact with anyone who has tested positive for COVID-19?
self_t_question_test_drop_down_05: How many Boosters have you had so far?

medical_history_text_one: The following questions will contribute to a better understanding of the medical history of our participants and are intended to provide general information for educational purposes
medical_history_text_three: Would you like to provide additional information about your Medical History?
medical_history_text_four: Do you jave any of the following conditions that the CDC classifies as risk factors for severe COVID-19?
self_t_question_vissible_2: In the last 14 days, have you tested positive for COVID-19?
self_t_question_vissible_3: When did you test positive for COVID-19
self_t_question_vissible_4: When did you test positive for COVID-19
self_t_question_vissible_5: When did you receive your most recent COVID-19 vaccine?
self_t_question_vissible_6: Which vaccine(s) did you receive? (Please select all that apply)
covid_before_question: Did you have Covid-19 before? (Please select all that apply)
race_answer_four: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Island
graduate_level: What is the highest degree or level of school you have completed? if currently enrolled, highest degree received. This information is only collected for us to understand our demographic and are not an evaluation of you or your abilities.
alert_text_reset: Password has been sent to your email
alert_text_error: There was an error reseting your password please try again.
alert_text_error_two: We could not find a test with that Id
alert_text_password_error: There was an error, and your password couldnt be updated
alert_text_error_update: We could not update your information
alert_text_error_update_one: We could not load your information, please try again
password_validate_text_one: Invalid field, it must have at least 6 characters
user_name_text_one: Invalid email, it must be greater than 4 characters
test_history_empty: At this moment you dont have any test in your history
